name: satisfiable
content:
satisfiable adjective
(WANTS/NEEDS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal able to provide someone with what they want or need: Lower order desires are those that are immediately satisfiable by such things as food, drink, or sleep. The new rules place various demands on citizens, all of which are easily satisfiable.
More examplesFewer examplesThese rules apply only when the conditions are satisfiable.

satisfiable adjective
(MATHEMATICS)
mathematics
  specialized A mathematical problem that is satisfiable has one or more solutions: The corresponding formula turned out to be satisfiable. We plotted the proportion of satisfiable formulas for each ratio value. Related word
satisfy
